Key:
(I'm going to invite Origami to eat lunch with
me today.)
Translation: (Voy a invitar a Origami a comer conmigo hoy).

Key:
Whoa! W-Wait, Origami! I didn't say anything
ye—
Translation:
¡Vaya! ¡Es-Espera, Origami!
Yo no he dicho nada ye-

Key: You want to eat lunch with me. Am I wrong?

We're going to eat by the stairs over there.
That way, we'll be alone.
Translation:
Vamos a comer por las escaleras de allí.
Así estaremos solos.

Key:
Oh, okay. It's a bit hot out, but eating outdoors
is always nice.
Translation:
Oh, vale. Hace un poco de calor, pero comer
al aire libre siempre es agradable.

Key:
(Homemade Hamburg steak today. The shape's
kind of wonky, but... I know it'll taste good!)
Translation:
(Hamburguesa casera hoy. La forma es un
poco torcida, pero... ¡sé que sabrá bien!)

Key: Can I have the big one...?

Oh. Um, y-you're talking... about the steak,
right?
Translation:
Oh. Um, e-estás hablando…
¿de la carne, verdad?

Key:
Okay, s-sure. The shape's a bit off, but it's
homemade so I guarantee it's good.
Translation:
Ok, s-seguro. La forma es un poco rara,
pero es casera, así que te garantizo que es buena.

Key: I don't mind. The shape doesn't matter to me.
Translation: No me importa. La forma no me importa.

Key: Hurry up and give it to me.

A-Are you okay, Origami?! You look like
you're in a lot of pain.
Translation:
¡¿Estás bien, Origami?!
Parece que te duele mucho.

Key: I-I see... Glad to hear it.

The moment it entered my mouth, it was
juicy and delectable.
Translation:
En cuanto entró en mi boca,
estaba jugoso y delicioso.

Key:
Y-Yeah. I made sure to prepare it with
that in mind. It had a lot of—
Translation:
Sí. Me aseguré de prepararlo con eso en mente.
Tenía un montón de-

Key:
*grunt*! W-Well, it was homemade! I'm
happy you enjoyed it, so...
Translation:
¡*gruñir*! Bueno, ¡era casero! Me alegro
de que lo disfrutaras, así que...

Key: (Ha... Haha... Why am I so sweaty?)
